  • Clear Views, Day or Night Experience crystal-clear 2K resolution for sharp outdoor monitoring. Wireless outdoor camera with 360° horizontal and 136° vertical coverage, our one-tap panorama feature lets you see every angle quickly. Plus, our advanced night vision capabilities ensure detailed imaging in both full color and IR.
  • No Wi-Fi Needed, Unlimited 4G Data Plan Ideal for remote locations like farms or campsites, our camera’s unlimited 4G data plan ensures you’re always connected. In addition to the provided 100MB 4G Eitoclub SIM card, this camera offers compatibility with major carriers such as Verizon, T-MOBILE, and AT&T, ensuring easy monitoring in any outdoor setting.
  • Endless Power by the Sun Harness the sun’s energy with a 5W solar panel that utilizes advanced ETFE technology for optimal efficiency and durability. This panel is paired with a 10400mAh battery, providing lasting power and ensuring your camera remains constantly powered with just 2 hours of daily sunlight charging.
  • Stay Connected, Precise Detection Whether monitoring your farm’s barns or overseeing a campsite, this camera delivers maximum protection with its siren and light alarm triggered by human detection. Enjoy clear two-way audio or use voice commands with Alexa & Google Assistant for easy control.
  • Reliable & Secure Data Storage Store critical footage locally with a 64 GB MicroSD card included. Your data’s privacy is backed by TÜV Rheinland and ISO/IEC 27001 certification. Weatherproof IP65 design provides reliable performance across all outdoor environments.

• 2K 3MP HD
  • 10400mAh Rechargeable Battery
  • 360° Smart Tracking
  • AI Human Detection
  • IP65 Weatherproof
  • Solar Panel Compatible
  • Full-Color Night Vision
  • Two-way Audio
